string.text: 私人调查: 斯卡多夫斯克居民的问题

Gonta has asked you to find a group of stalkers being led by a guide called Horns who have gone missing. Before widening your search find out what you can about him and those he was travelling with from the locals.
私人调查: 检查三个可能的位置
You managed to gleen three possible area's where Horns and his team may be you need to check them all.
私人调查: 和你的雇主交谈
You need to report on your findings in the places checked and decide what to do next.
You must check at the containers campsite for Horns and co.
私人调查: 检查一个地方
You must check at the container warehouse for Hom's and co.
私人调查: 检查一个地方
你必须检查一个营地,靠近钢铁森林特异点.
私人调查: 检查一个地方
你必须检查庇护所,靠近火烧农场.
私人调查: 等待更多消息
The missing squad has been in contact with the Skadovsk residents, The situation is becoming clearer however you will have to wait until they make contact again to find out more.
私人调查: 和你的雇主交谈
Ask Gonta what he was told regarding the missing men.
私人调查: 会见失踪小队首领
Gonta managed to contact the leader of the missing detachment and learned some very strange facts about the fate of there guide. You need to talk to him and find out the truth.
私人调查: 护送他到指定的区域

The case has taken an unexpected turn, You will need to assist the stalkers in order to get the opportunity to conduct further investigations, You need to help there leader meet up with his squad, He must be kept alive.
私人调查: 击退突变体
The situation has still not been resolved so you need to continue helping and fight of an attack by mutants.
私人调查: 跟着PDA的信号
The fella managed to get you the frequency of Horns PDA signal as he said, follow it.
私人调查: 杀死号角
It turns out Hom's is not who he pretends to be and is a player for the syndicate, He is not co-operating so kill him.
私人调查: 返回斯卡多夫斯克
It is time to report on all that has happened and close the case.
隐蔽反对: 决定做什么
Mercenaries are plotting a dangerous adventure against Duty and Freedom. You have been allocated a main role. Decide what you will do - take the side of Duty, or their opponents.
隐蔽性: 说服洛基与你方对话.

In order to assist in resolving the potential conflict, it is necessary to implicate the Freedom stalkers. To do this convince Loki to send a detachment of people for a sabotage mission against the Duty.
隐蔽反对: 等待自由团到达河湾
You must wait until the commencement of the special operation. Prepare for it during this time.
隐蔽反对: 消灭自由团破坏者
Instead of a joint action against Duty, kill the Freedom saboteurs.
隐蔽反对: 检查纪律团保护的科学家小组
Recieved an unexpected message from Shulga. The detachment of his soldiers who were guarding the scientists did not make contact as arranged. Find out what happened ...
隐蔽反对: 查问受伤的佣兵发生了什么
The Dutiers and the scientists died. Nearby lies a wounded mercenary left to die by his clan. Find out from him what happened.
隐蔽反对: 杀佣兵.

The merc deceived you and tricked you to do what you may not off. Now Duty and Freedom will believe that you rigged this whole adventure. Kill the wounded merc and decide what to do in this difficult situation ...
隐蔽反对: 对话你方卷进了什么事
Talk to the saber and decide how you will deal with it, the mercenaries, or return the neutrality of other clans.
隐蔽反对: 对话洛基
Convince Freedom's leader in your 'innocence' regarding the incident.
隐蔽反对: 与舒尔加中校会面
Convince the Duty leader in his innocence and lack of communication with the mercenaries ...
隐蔽反对: 让舒尔加中校知道对科学家可能的攻击

In order to 'assist' Freedom in the brewing adventure Shulga need to be convinced that he needs to transfer a group of his best fighters for you to use when you indicate a possible change to the route to enter Zaton.
反对秘密: 等待svobodovtsy到河湾.
Group svobodovskih saboteurs sent to the Creek. Wait until their arrival.
反对秘密: 会见首领svobodovtsev.
Speak with the commander of the detachment svobodovskogo upcoming surgery.
反对秘密: 选好位置
Prepare for an ambush on the team of scientists and a detachment of debt, taking a good position ...
反对秘密: 消灭科学家.
Destroy all the scientists and their accompanying dolgovtsev.
反对秘密: 搜科学家的箱子.
Collect next to the body of the murdered scientist with a cargo of valuable information.
反对秘密: 消灭支队的领导.
Mercenaries had been instructed to carry out sabotage against the two clans. Therefore, destroy, and svobodovtsev too.
反对秘密: 和不明佣兵交谈.
The mercenaries were sent a man kontroliravshego operation ... We need to discuss with him how to proceed.
反对秘密: 说服舒尔加中校袭击的清白.
Follow to Dolgovskomu colonel and convince in his innocence to what has happened. Thus it will be possible with the duty of neutrality.
隐蔽性: 说服洛基,死亡的小队,svobodovskogo的清白...
Follow the leader and convince svobodovtsev in his innocence to what has happened. Thus it will be possible with the freedom of neutrality.
优先选择: 对话巴吉尔

The Sultan has instructed you to conduct a special investigation and you found that his man Yakut has deceived him. First you need to get all possible information about Yakut from a Freedom 'whistleblower' called Bagheera.
优先选择: 会见卢西恩
Bagir said that the Yakut was caught Lucian a new member in the bandit gang of Chapaev who's based in Zaton's ranger station. Go there and check the veracity of the words of the informer.
优先选择: 询问雅库特

Lucian had promised to go on a possible compromise between the maturing konfrantatsii bandit clans, only if you manage to extract from the Yakut information on stolen documents. Get them in a hostage.
优先选择: 等待处理
Yakut split. But anyway it is no longer a rescue. Wait until it's over, and start hunting for caches.
优先选择: 寻找雅库特三个文件

Yakut before his death, told by you of all the stolen documents, the Sultan, which he hid in the recesses on the Creek and Jupiter. We'll have to find them under the tip of his words: '. Choke ... three cache. Creek on two: the recycling station and close to the BIS in the sewers ... and Janov, in his career ... in ... the iron. . cr .. '
优先选择: 决定做什么
All the documents you have the Sultan. Decide which side to take the bandit: Sultan and Lucian.
优先选择: 告诉洛基巴吉尔不可靠.

You have given the documents with all the information on the smuggling Lyutsianu. Now it is necessary to come up with a suitable excuse for the Sultan. Try to put all the blame on the informer svobodovskogo Bagheera.
优先选择: 消灭巴吉尔
Loki is believed duplicity stalker Bagheera, and gave its tacit consent to his removal. Kill svobodovtsa.
优先选择: 欺骗苏丹
Go see the Sultan and dump all the blame on the failure of his job on the informant Bagheera.
优先选择: 等待卢西恩

All documents are returned to the customer. Now the Sultan asked you to deal with a competitor in the smuggling - Lyutsianom. According to the obtained data from the Bagheera Lucian must soon leave the base and go to Jupiter. Wait for his appearance.
优先选择: 杀卢西恩和他的人
消灭 competitors Sultan.
优先选择: 向苏丹报告成功
Lucian is dead. Go back to the customer for a reward.
